title: Ways of water
creator_credit: Gregory Heimer and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Examines the undisturbed nature of water, explaining the difference forms as ice, streams, dew, mist, rain, clouds and the sea. Shows the relationship between water and the forests, insects, fish, birds and other elements. Filmed at the Olympic National Park in the State of Washington, USA.
